Source.Name: perl-try-tiny
Source.Summary: Try::Tiny - Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@
Source.Description: This module provides bare bones try/catch/finally statements that are designed to minimize common mistakes with eval blocks, and NOTHING else.

Package.Name: perl-try-tiny
